title: Symphony of Justice Comics
body:
Here's a comic series I will do from time to time featuring Garen and Sona. It's all just for fun. I will add more comics of this series from time to time. :)

You can check out some of the other league art and more in the link below:
http://shouhda.deviantart.com/

(Open in new window for full size!)

:thumb520503677:

replies.body:
I love this!  

I main Sona, and that might just be my favorite skin too.  Arcade Sona might get all the attention, and DJ Sona is having her day in the sun, but Pentakill Sona will rise again!  Mwahahaha.
So that's how Sona joined the band... love this.
I would check it out, except you chose the worst site to host all of it on.
